about.description:
Mesa is an Apache2 licensed agent-based modeling (or ABM)
framework in Python. It allows users to quickly create agent-based
models using built-in core components (such as spatial grids and
agent schedulers) or customized implementations; visualize them
using a browser-based interface; and analyze their results using
Python's data analysis tools. Its goal is to be the Python 3-based
alternative to NetLogo, Repast, or MASON.

Mesa is an Apache2 licensed agent-based modeling (or ABM)
framework in Python. It allows users to quickly create agent-based
models using built-in core components (such as spatial grids and
agent schedulers) or customized implementations; visualize them
using a browser-based interface; and analyze their results using
Python's data analysis tools. Its goal is to be the Python 3-based
alternative to NetLogo, Repast, or MASON.

name: mesa

new_version_errors.0.8.8:
The recipe did not change in the version migration, a URL did not hash, or there is jinja2 syntax the bot cannot handle!

Please check the URLs in your recipe with version '0.8.8' to make sure they exist!

We also found the following errors:

 - could not hash URL template 'https://pypi.io/packages/source/m/mesa/Mesa-{{ version }}.tar.gz'

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "mesa" %}
{% set version = "0.8.9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/m/mesa/Mesa-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 603adf98ad8a2d2db57689e9b281ffba15bd3174438d37a3668d54b921b12c18

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - mesa=mesa.main:cli
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3
  run:
    - click
    - cookiecutter
    - networkx
    - numpy
    - pandas
    - python >=3
    - tornado
    - tqdm

test:
  imports:
    - mesa
  commands:
    - mesa --help

about:
  home: https://github.com/projectmesa/mesa
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Agent-based modeling (ABM) in Python 3+
  description: |
    Mesa is an Apache2 licensed agent-based modeling (or ABM) 
    framework in Python. It allows users to quickly create agent-based 
    models using built-in core components (such as spatial grids and 
    agent schedulers) or customized implementations; visualize them 
    using a browser-based interface; and analyze their results using 
    Python's data analysis tools. Its goal is to be the Python 3-based 
    alternative to NetLogo, Repast, or MASON.
  doc_url: https://mesa.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/projectmesa/mesa

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - estshorter
    - jackiekazil
    - dmasad
